sentences.en: Detach power steering reservoir from fan shroud and lay aside.
sentences.cn: 将动力转向储液罐同风扇罩分开并放至一边.

sentences.en: Detach the arches from the carpet and remove all pendants.
sentences.cn: 把架子连饰物从垫子上拆下.

sentences.en: Detach the coupon and return it as soon as possible.
sentences.cn: 将赠券撕下后尽快寄回。

sentences.en: Detach the management and technic which we already done.
sentences.cn: 管理与技术分开,项目部内部高度自治,这个我们已经做了.

sentences.en: Detach the white part of the application form and keep it for reference only.
sentences.cn: 取下申请表的白色部分，仅备参考。

sentences.en: Detach the white part of the application form and keep it.
sentences.cn: 把申请表的白色部分撕下存底。

sentences.en: DLL _ THREAD _ DETACH The DLL receives this value when a thread in the process is destroyed.
sentences.cn: DLL_THREAD_ DETACH当进程中的线程被销毁时,dll接收到这个值.

sentences.en: Don't detach the coach from the train.
sentences.cn: 别把这个车箱从火车上拆下来.

sentences.en: He decided to detach himself from the human world, and practice Buddhism.
sentences.cn: 他决定超脱尘网, 一意修行.

sentences.en: It gave me a good reason to detach myself from the rest of the party.
sentences.cn: 这样我就有充分理由离开其余的人们.

sentences.en: It helps them detach themselves from their problems and become more objective.
sentences.cn: 这有助于他们从所面临的问题中跳出来，变得更客观一些。

sentences.en: It is easy to detach the currants from the stems.
sentences.cn: 很容易就能把醋栗从梗上摘下来。

sentences.en: It's impossible to detach oneself from reality.
Otherwise it must detach units to preserve signal and road communications, protect dumps and convoys.
sentences.cn: 否则必须派遣部队去维持秩序和交通, 保护仓库和运输.

sentences.en: Please detach and fill out the application form.
They clambered back under the falls to detach the raft from a jagged rock.
sentences.cn: 他们爬回到瀑布下面以便将卡在锯齿状岩石间的小艇拉出来。

sentences.en: We should detach good apples from bad.
sentences.cn: 我们必须把好的苹果与坏的分开。

sentences.en: You can detach the handle of the saucepan by undoing this screw.
sentences.cn: 拧开这螺丝就能把平底锅的长柄取下来.

words.tran_cn: 可分开的；可拆开的；可分遣的
分离，拆开；超然；分遣；分遣队

trans.tran_en: to remove sth from sth larger; to become separated from sth

trans.tran_cn: 拆卸； 使分开， 使分离
trans.tran_en: if you detach something, or if it detaches, it becomes separated from the thing it was attached to
